faqs.question: What does Razorpay do?
faqs.answer: Razorpay is India's leading payment gateway and financial solutions provider. We help businesses accept online payments, automate payouts, manage subscriptions, and handle all their financial operations in one platform.

faqs.question: Who is Razorpay for?
faqs.answer: Razorpay is perfect for any business accepting online payments - from freelancers and small businesses to large enterprises. We serve e-commerce stores, SaaS companies, educational institutions, healthcare providers, and more.

faqs.question: Do you have a free tier?
faqs.answer: We don't have a free tier, but we have no setup fees or monthly charges. You only pay per transaction - 2% for domestic payments and 3% for international payments. This means you only pay when you earn.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you support?
faqs.answer: We support 100+ payment methods including credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, mobile wallets like Paytm and PhonePe, and Buy Now Pay Later options like LazyPay and Simpl.

faqs.question: How long does integration take?
faqs.answer: Integration is very simple! With our APIs and plugins, most businesses can integrate in 1-2 days. We have ready plugins for Shopify, WooCommerce, and other platforms. For custom integration, our documentation and support team makes it easy.

faqs.question: Is Razorpay secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We are PCI DSS Level 1 compliant, the highest security standard for payment companies. We use bank-grade encryption and have multiple layers of fraud detection to keep transactions safe.

faqs.question: What are your transaction fees?
faqs.answer: We charge 2% per transaction for domestic payments (cards, UPI, netbanking, wallets) and 3% for international card payments. There are no setup fees, no monthly fees, and no hidden charges.

faqs.question: Can I accept international payments?
faqs.answer: Yes! Razorpay supports international card payments from Visa, Mastercard, and American Express from customers worldwide. We charge 3% per international transaction.

faqs.question: Do you offer instant settlement?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer instant settlements where you can access your funds in minutes instead of waiting 2-3 days. This feature is available for eligible businesses and has a small additional fee.

faqs.question: What support do you provide?
faqs.answer: We provide 24/7 customer support via email, phone, and chat. We also have extensive documentation, video tutorials, and a dedicated account manager for enterprise clients.

faqs.question: Can I use Razorpay without a website?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can use Payment Links or Payment Pages to accept payments without a website. Just create a link, share it via WhatsApp or email, and start collecting payments immediately.

faqs.question: What is RazorpayX?
faqs.answer: RazorpayX is our business banking platform that offers current accounts, automated payroll, vendor payments, corporate cards, and expense management - all in one dashboard. It's perfect for managing your entire business finances.
